title: Whats the point of placements???
body: I went 6 of 10 ( 4 of those games i had an afk in my team. And my mate went 7 and 3 ( was silver last season. We both went straight to B5. Like seriously, riot if its pre-determined where we go just say so and drop us all  to bronze in elo hell, where kids argue for top and mid and afk when they dont get what they want, stop screwing around with us with irrelevant provisional games.

replies.body:
that honestly makes no sense. if his MMR was below 1200 he should have gone up in MMR (not in ranking)
so unless his MMR WAS WAY BELOW bronze 5...impossible since he would have dropped...then there is really no explanation for this...

its like a plat 5 player that went to silver 1 from going 3-7. rito said the drop will be less than last season....but heres a guy going 3-7, dropping further than last season plat 5s going 1-9 (iwilldecimate and whysoserious went 1-9 last season from plat 5 to gold 4) i dont even understand...riot first lies about old placements, and now all we see is devastation to anyone who went half bad. and some who went quite decently. while some %%%%ters get off easy, placed into silver 3 on 2 accounts while being %%%% at annie. gglendo.

@snakeman86 dont know what your complaining about, silver/bronze/low gold all the same, but if you think they are not and you belong in silver, wont you get there yourself??? 
Stop being a B!tch and accept that you got boosted last season

Look, good on you for getting up that morning, putting on your big boy pants and talking tough, but read the post mate. my argument was if its basically already pre determimed then why bother with placements at all and just pick up new season based on mmr or where you finished up last season, instead of wasting time with 10 irrelevant pre season games.
